documentRequiredIndicator: PHYSICAL DOCUMENT MUST BE IN IMMEDIATE POSSESSION
documentRequiredReminder: Customers must carry the physical document while using this license.
welcomeWords: Welcome to CDFW's Mobile License Application
userPagesFooter: If you're having issues with accessing your customer record, contact CDFW at (916) 928-2537 or LRB@wildlife.ca.gov.
userAcknowledgement: I certify under penalty of perjury under the laws of the State of California that all information provided to the CDFW Mobile license Application is true and correct and that I meet the requirements for the licenses displayed in this application. I understand it is unlawful to make any false statement in this application or to use or possess a license obtained by fraud or deceit (Fish and Game Code §§1052(b) and 1054).
